MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 03-NOV-2020 16:15.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is an unplanned power cut in the G62 postcode area of Glasgow. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to conduct further investigations to progress with the repair, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:15pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:52pm on the 3rd of November 2020.
